data.lyric:
[ti:Ocean Eyes]
[ar:Billie Eilish]
[al:Common Culture, Vol. V]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]ocean eyes - Billie Eilish
[00:04.53]Lyrics by：Finneas O'Connell
[00:09.06]Composed by：Finneas O'Connell
[00:13.60]I've been watching you
[00:16.36]
[00:16.89]For some time
[00:19.12]
[00:20.20]Can't stop staring
[00:22.76]At those ocean eyes
[00:25.80]
[00:26.83]Burning cities
[00:30.13]And napalm skies
[00:32.32]
[00:33.48]Fifteen flares inside those ocean eyes
[00:38.80]
[00:39.76]Your ocean eyes
[00:42.77]No fair
[00:48.68]
[00:49.81]You really know how to make me cry
[00:52.22]When you give me those ocean eyes
[00:55.17]
[00:55.70]I'm scared
[01:01.31]
[01:02.91]I've never fallen from quite this high
[01:05.24]Falling into your ocean eyes
[01:08.42]
[01:09.43]Those ocean eyes
[01:12.01]
[01:13.25]I've been walking through
[01:16.31]A world gone blind
[01:18.64]
[01:19.79]Can't stop thinking of your diamond mind
[01:25.06]
[01:26.42]Careful creature
[01:28.90]Made friends with time
[01:31.92]
[01:32.75]He left her lonely with a diamond mind
[01:38.29]
[01:39.05]And those ocean eyes
[01:42.34]No fair
[01:47.66]
[01:49.03]You really know how to make me cry
[01:51.64]When you give me those ocean eyes
[01:55.33]I'm scared
[02:00.91]
[02:02.44]I've never fallen from quite this high
[02:04.91]Falling into your ocean eyes
[02:08.08]
[02:09.02]Those ocean eyes
[02:11.44]
[02:41.78]No fair
[02:47.06]
[02:48.58]You really know how to make me cry
[02:51.31]When you give me those ocean eyes
[02:54.37]
[02:55.04]I'm scared
[03:00.07]
[03:01.85]I've never fallen from quite this high
[03:04.54]Falling into your ocean eyes
[03:07.55]
[03:08.64]Those ocean eyes
